directions: Toss together the cantaloupe, honeydew, watermelon, apple, banana, and mango in a large bowl.  Divide the fruit into six paper cups.  Pour 1/2 cup of lemon-lime soda into each cup.  Place in the freezer for 5 minutes, then serve.
ingredients: 3 cups lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
title: Frozen Fruit and Soda Cups
